projectDescription: Eco-frendly playground, with pool for wildlife

milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Conducting a feasibility study, Identifying key stakeholders, Defining project objectives and scope, Developing a detailed project plan

milestones.title: Design and Development
milestones.description: Creating design blueprints for the playground and wildlife pool, Selecting eco-friendly materials, Conducting an environmental impact assessment, Obtaining necessary permits and approvals

milestones.title: Construction of Playground
milestones.description: Site preparation and excavation, Installation of playground equipment, Construction of safety measures and accessibility features

milestones.title: Construction of Wildlife Pool
milestones.description: Site preparation and excavation for the pool, Construction of the pool with eco-friendly materials, Installation of water filtration and circulation systems

milestones.title: Project Closure
milestones.description: Conducting a final inspection, Addressing any issues or concerns, Officially opening the playground and wildlife pool to the public, Documentation and handover
